Package org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree

Class Meta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree.Meta
  • public class Meta
extends Object
    About versioning (i.e. the format version int): The format version started out as one int controlling the entire version of the tree and its different types of formats. For compatibility reasons this int has been kept but used differently, i.e. split up into four individual versions, one byte each. These are: 
         <------- int ------>
 msb [ 3 ][ 2 ][ 1 ][ 0 ] lsb
       ▲    ▲    ▲    ▲
       │    │    │    │
       │    │    │    └──────────── getFormatIdentifier()
       │    │    └───────────────── getFormatVersion()
       │    └────────────────────── getUnusedVersionSlot3()
       └─────────────────────────── getUnusedVersionSlot4()
    CURRENT_STATE_VERSION and CURRENT_GBPTREE_VERSION aren't used yet because they have never needed to be versioned yet, but remain reserved for future use. The are fixed at 0 a.t.m.

      • read

        static Meta read​(PageCursor cursor,
                 Layout<?,​?> layout)
          throws IOException
        Reads meta information from the meta page. Reading meta information also involves Layout in that it can have written layout-specific information to this page too. The layout identifier and its version that the returned Meta instance will have are the ones read from the page, not retrieved from Layout.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to read meta information from.
        layout - Layout instance that will get the opportunity to read layout-specific data from the meta page. layout is allowed to be null where it won't be told to read layout-specific data from the meta page.
        Returns:
        Meta instance with all meta information.
        Throws:
        IOException - on PageCursor I/O error.

      • verify

        public void verify​(Layout<?,​?> layout)

      • write

        void write​(PageCursor cursor,
           Layout<?,​?> layout)
        Writes meta information to the meta page. Writing meta information also involves Layout in that it can write layout-specific information to this page too.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to read meta information from.
        layout - Layout instance that will get the opportunity to write layout-specific data to the meta page.
